column2: "Asɛm a ofi EWURADZE nkyɛn baa Jeremia hɔ
column6: na bɔ asɛm yi dawur wɔ hɔ
column8: Hom Judafo nyinara a hom hɛn ɔponkɛse yi mu dɛ wɔrobɔsɔr EWURADZE

column2: "Mbrɛ dɔm EWURADZE
column3: Israel Nyankopɔn no ɔse nye yi
column4: Hom nsakyer hom akwan nye hom ndzeyɛɛ
column5: na mebɛma hom atsena bea yi do ha."

column2: "Mma hom nntwer atorsɛm
"Na sɛ hom sakyer hom akwan nye hom ndzeyɛɛ koraa; sɛ hom bu nyimpa nye ne nyɛnko ntamu atsɛn nokwarmu;"
"sɛ hom anntseetsee hɔho
column5: na hom annka onndzi fɔ bɔgyaa enngu wɔ bea yi do
column6: eso hom ennkedzi abosom afofor bi ekyir annyɛ homankasa homho bɔn a
column8: "ɔno na mebɛma hom atsena bea yi do
column9: asaase a medze maa hom egyanom

column2: "Hom nhwɛ
column3: hom twer atorsɛm a ɔnnyɛ mfaso bi no."

column2: "Aso hom bowia adze
column6: na hom ahyew eduhuam ama Baal na hom edzi abosom a hom nnyim hɔn no ekyir
column8: "na hom aba ebegyina m’enyim wɔ ofi yi a wɔdze me dzin ato no yi mu na hom ase dɛ
column9: Wɔagye hɛn nkwa: ama hom aayɛ ekyiwadze yinom nyinara?"

column2: "Aso ofi a wɔdze me dzin ato no yi adan edwotwafo tu wɔ hom enyiwa mu? Hwɛ
"Na afei hom nkɔ me bea a ɔwɔ Siloh a memaa wɔkyerɛɛw me dzin wɔ hɔ asɔpɔn no
column3: na hom nkɔhwɛ dza medze yɛɛ no wɔ me man Israel emumuyɛ ntsi."

column2: "Na afei osiandɛ hom ayɛ dɛm ndzeyɛɛ yinom nyina ntsi
column6: naaso hom enntsie; na mefrɛɛ hom

column2: "dɛm ntsi na mebɛyɛ ofi a wɔdze me dzin ato no a hom dze hom werɛ twer no
column3: ɔnye bea a medze maa hom nye hom egyanom no

column2: "Na mobɔtow hom efi m’enyim akyen
"Dɛm ntsi mma nnsɔr mma ɔman yi
column3: eso mma mmpegya osu anaa mpaabɔ wɔ hɔn ntsi
column4: eso mma nndzi nkotoserɛ nnkyerɛ me: osiandɛ mirinntsie wo."

column2: "Ana innhu dza wɔreyɛ no Juda nkurow nye Jerusalɛm abrɔn mu?"
"Mbofra tase nyena
column5: dɛ wɔreyɛ tatar ama ɔsor hembaa
column6: na woehue ɔnom afɔr ama abosom afofor bi

column2: "Aso emi na woyi me ebufuw? EWURADZE na ɔse; aso wonnyi hɔnankasa hɔnho ebufuw
column3: dze gu hɔnankasa hɔn enyim ase?"

column2: "Dɛm ntsi mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se nye yi: Hwɛ
column3: m’ebufuw na m’ebufuhyew bohue egu bea yi do
column7: na daadze eduaba do; na ɔbɛdzɛw

column2: "Mbrɛ dɔm EWURADZE
column4: ɔse nye yi: Hom mfa hom ɔhyew afɔr nka hom okum afɔr ho

column2: "Na mannkasa annkyerɛ hom egyanom
column3: eso mannhyɛ hɔn mbra da no a miyii hɔn fii Egypt asaase no do no
column4: wɔ ɔhyew afɔr na okum afɔr ho:"

column2: "na mbra a mehyɛɛ hɔn nye iyi
column6: na hom so ayɛ me man: na hom nnantsew ɔkwan a mahyɛ hom nyina mu

column2: "Naaso woenntsie
column4: na mbom wɔnantseew hɔnankasa hɔn akoma bɔn n’egyinatu na ne ntsintsiman do
column5: na wɔsaan ekyir na wɔannkɔ kan."

column2: "Ofitsi
column3: da a hom egyanom fiir Egypt asaase do bae dze bodu ndɛ
column4: masoma mo nkowaa nkɔnhyɛfo no nyinara aba hom nkyɛn
column5: dabiara mosoɛr ahanamakye na mosoma hɔn:"

column2: "naaso woenntsie me
column4: na mbom wɔsorowee mbordo: wɔyɛɛ bɔn seen hɔn egyanom."

column2: "Ntsi ɔwo na ebɛka nsɛm yinom nyinara akyerɛ hɔn; naaso wonnketsie; ebɛfrɛ hɔn so; na wɔnnkɛgye wo do."
"Na ebɛka akyerɛ hɔn dɛ
column3: Woyi nye ɔman a woenntsie EWURADZE hɔn Nyankopɔn ne ndze

column2: "Jerusalɛm
column4: na twa ewuo wɔ mpampaa pataa do; osiandɛ EWURADZE apow mbasantsen a wɔhyɛɛ no ebufuw no na ɔadan hɔn egya."

column2: "Na Judamba ayɛ dza omuo wɔ m’enyim
column3: EWURADZE na ɔse: wɔdze hɔn ekyiwadze esisi ofi a wɔdze me dzin ato do no mu

column2: "Na woesi Tofet a ɔwɔ Hinom ba no bɔnsa no mu nsorɔnsorɔmbea
column3: dɛ wɔbɛhyew hɔn mbabanyin na hɔn mbabaa wɔ gya mu; dza nnyɛ emi na mehyɛe

column2: "Dɛm ntsi hwɛ
column7: na mbom Okum bɔnsa: na wobesie efun wɔ Tofet ara ma ekodu dɛ wonnya siebea bio."

column2: "Na ɔman yi hɔn efun bɛyɛ edziban ama ɔsor nnoma
column3: nye asaase mbowa: na obiara remmpam hɔn."

column2: "Nna mebɛma ahosɛpɛw ndze na enyigye ndze
column5: na Jerusalɛm abrɔn mu: na asaase no bɛdan amamfo."
